casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Amy Rebecca McARTHUR. No. 363PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 6, 2009. Thomas J. Ziko, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of January 2009 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of January 2009."
